title: 10/4/2017 - Live Maintenance
body:
[](https://i.gyazo.com/4ad644d48fa969161e193be6a4abc25f.png)
Hey guys,

Our network team is currently running live network maintenance on NA.  You may experience brief disruptions while in-game or on the client.  I don't have an ETA for the duration of the maintenance, but updates will be posted on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.

replies.body: Dc/d from game on At&t in Cali
Hey, are you able to get in now?

I am now able to get into a game as far as custom goes not sure if that helps don't want to start an actual game. I just queued up for a normal blind pick game was able to load in everything looks back to normal
D/C just happened to me as well. Hoping loss prevented or something, because when I started the game there was no news of live maintenance.

Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game.

Aka, I just DC'd out of a ranked game and it won't let me reconnect with this message. Assuming this is the cause? Watching other streams of NA players and they aren't having problems, Twitch chat isn't exploding about NA being down or anything, and my own team wasn't having issues (was able to reconnect one time for about 3 minutes before DC'ing again and not getting back in ever since.)

FeelsBadMan, I'm gonna lose LP and get leaver busted for this crap.
I DC'd out of my ranked game and can't reconnect. I'm on Comcast in CA.

I'm on Charter Spectrum in CA.

Glad I'm not the only one, but sad that it's happening to begin with. NeverLucky...

Hey, sorry to hear about that.  :(  I've reached out for more info, but I don't believe this might be caused by the current maintenance.  There might be ISP issues currently on the Pacific, but we could get more info to find out more.

Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a traceroute to 104.160.131.1 for about 5 minutes.  Remove the first 2 IPs on that list, and let me know your results.  This will help us find where the hiccup is coming from.

|                                      WinMTR statistics                                   |
|                       Host              -   %  | Sent | Recv | Best | Avrg | Wrst | Last |

|                   No response from host -  100 |   21 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |
|                   No response from host -  100 |   21 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |
|                   No response from host -  100 |   21 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |

|________________________________________________|______|______|______|______|______|______|

Every other aspect of my internet is working so it's really unfortunate. My team won 4v5, But it gave me leaverbuster and a loss for the game.

Same, just got D/C'd from a Ranked game and no overt message of a live maintenance going on.
I just got back in, and yup, I got a leaver.  Thanks Riot.

Still looking into the cause of this, but reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  I can't make any guarantees of removing your leaverbuster but we can take a look.
Thanks.  Which category should I pick?
Same problem.  Will get a loss and afk reports.
